name: Three's a Crowd (HighQualitySoup)
description:
Use WASD / Arrow Keys to control character, avoid orange circles, and collet yellow squares for points.
This game is the first game that I have ever published and took three days to make. I plan on making one game a week to try and learn Unity. It was inspired by the flash game "Three Body Problem". While it is an improper copy of the flash game I had trouble thinking about a subject and saw the game as a great idea for inspiration.

Song: https://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music/track/pop-dance

I am currently trying to make one game a week until I learn Unity. Current Week: 1
What I need to learn:
Tilemaps for background.
Code structure, currently a spaghetti mess.

Known Bug:
Holding down more than one movement button will lock the movement axis on start or restart.
